Plain Description: Interview and examination status of the participant.

Plain Description: Gender of the participant.

Label: Race/Hispanic origin
Plain Description: Recode of reported race and Hispanic origin information
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS -150 YEARS
Encoding: {1: 'Mexican American', 2: 'Other Hispanic', 3: 'Non-Hispanic White', 4: 'Non-Hispanic Black', 5: 'Other Race - Including Multi-Racial', '.': 'Missing'}

Plain Description: Recode of reported race and Hispanic origin information, with Non-Hispanic Asian Category
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS -150 YEARS
Encoding: {1: 'Mexican American', 2: 'Other Hispanic', 3: 'Non-Hispanic White', 4: 'Non-Hispanic Black', 6: 'Non-Hispanic Asian', 7: 'Other Race - Including Multi-Racial', '.': 'Missing'}

Label: Six month time period
Plain Description: Six month time period when the examination was performed - two categories: November 1 through April 30, May 1 through October 31.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS -150 YEARS

Label: Served active duty in US Armed Forces
Plain Description: {Have you/Has SP} ever served on active duty in the U.S. Armed Forces, military Reserves, or National Guard? (Active duty does not include training for the Reserves or National Guard, but does include activation, for service in the U.S. or in a foreign country, in support of military or humanitarian operations.)
Target: Both males and females 17 YEARS -150 YEARS

Label: Served in a foreign country
Plain Description: Did {you/SP} ever serve in a foreign country during a time of armed conflict or on a humanitarian or peace-keeping mission? (This would include National Guard or reserve or active duty monitoring or conducting peace keeping operations in Bosnia and Kosovo, in the Sinai between Egypt and Israel, or in response to the 2004 tsunami or Haiti in 2010.)
Target: Both males and females 17 YEARS -150 YEARS

Label: Country of birth
Plain Description: In what country {were you/was SP} born?
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS -150 YEARS
Encoding: {1: 'Born in 50 US states or Washington, DC', 2: 'Others', 77: 'Refused', 99: "Don't Know", '.': 'Missing'}

Label: Citizenship status
Plain Description: {Are you/Is SP} a citizen of the United States? [Information about citizenship is being collected by the U.S. Public Health Service to perform health related research. Providing this information is voluntary and is collected under the authority of the Public Health Service Act. There will be no effect on pending immigration or citizenship petitions.]
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS -150 YEARS
Encoding: {1: 'Citizen by birth or naturalization', 2: 'Not a citizen of the US', 7: 'Refused', 9: "Don't Know", '.': 'Missing'}

Label: Length of time in US
Plain Description: Length of time the participant has been in the US.
Target: Both males and females 0 YEARS -150 YEARS
Encoding: {1: 'Less than 1 year', 2: '1 year or more, but less than 5 years', 3: '5 year or more, but less than 10 years', 4: '10 year or more, but less than 15 years', 5: '15 year or more, but less than 20 years', 6: '20 year or more, but less than 30 years', 7: '30 year or more, but less than 40 years', 8: '40 year or more, but less than 50 years', 9: '50 years or more', 77: 'Refused', 99: "Don't Know", '.': 'Missing'}

Plain Description: What is the highest grade or level of school {you have/SP has} completed or the highest degree {you have/s/he has} received?
Target: Both males and females 6 YEARS -19 YEARS
Encoding: {0: 'Never attended / kindergarten only', 1: '1st grade', 2: '2nd grade', 3: '3rd grade', 4: '4th grade', 5: '5th grade', 6: '6th grade', 7: '7th grade', 8: '8th grade', 9: '9th grade', 10: '10th grade', 11: '11th grade', 12: '12th grade, no diploma', 13: 'High school graduate', 14: 'GED or equivalent', 15: 'More than high school', 55: 'Less than 5th grade', 66: 'Less than 9th grade', 77: 'Refused', 99: "Don't Know", '.': 'Missing'}

Label: Education level - Adults 20+
Plain Description: What is the highest grade or level of school {you have/SP has} completed or the highest degree {you have/s/he has} received?
Target: Both males and females 20 YEARS -150 YEARS
Encoding: {1: 'Less than 9th grade', 2: '9-11th grade (Includes 12th grade with no diploma)', 3: 'High school graduate/GED or equivalent', 4: 'Some college or AA degree', 5: 'College graduate or above', 7: 'Refused', 9: "Don't Know", '.': 'Missing'}
